actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require the Supreme Court to report the reversal of State criminal convictions in written decisions.

summary.text: Provides that whenever the Supreme Court reverses a State criminal conviction which has been upheld by the highest court of such State, it shall report in a written decision the legal justification for the reversal, citing such legal precedent, case law, and other authority as may be applicable. (Amends 28 U.S.C. 1257).

titles.title: A bill to require the Supreme Court to report the reversal of State criminal convictions in written decisions.
